title: Pro-Palestine activists used sledgehammers in action at Israel-linked firm, UK court told
description: Police officer suffered fractured spine during action at Elbit Systems factory near Bristol last year, Woolwich crown court hears
content:
​Six pro-Palestinian activists armed with sledgehammers attacked an Israeli-linked defence firm, with one striking a female police officer twice with his weapon, a court has heard.
Opening the trial at Woolwich crown court on Tuesday, the prosecutor,... [3225 chars]

title: ‘Please release the records’: Epstein survivors urge Congress over DoJ files
description: Survivors were joined by lawmakers including Marjorie Taylor Greene before House vote on releasing Epstein files
content:
A group of survivors of Jeffrey Epstein’s abuse gathered outside the US Capitol on Tuesday morning, demanding justice, accountability and the release of the justice department files related to the late convicted sex offender.

title: ‘I make decisions to win’: Wiegman defends her handling of Earps and Hampton
description: England’s head coach, Sarina Wiegman, has responded to criticism made by Mary Earps in the goalkeeper’s autobiography
content:
Sarina Wiegman has defended promoting Hannah Hampton to be England’s first-choice goalkeeper ahead of Mary Earps, saying she makes “decisions to win”, after Earps criticised the head coach’s move in her autobiography.
Wiegman, speaking at Wembley aft... [3296 chars]

title: Eamonn Holmes in 'trouble' as host sparks fury at GB News and could quit Britain
description: Eamonn Holmes is reportedly in a 'difficult place,' regularly clashing with his GB News colleagues while also facing ongoing financial pressures.
content: Eamonn Holmes is reportedly rubbing his GB News colleagues up the wrong way with his repeated "foul moods" and constant "clashes" with those who work for the programme. Last week, Eamonn revealed that his tax row with HMRC has cost him more than £1 m... [3631 chars]
